project.name: JRuby
project.description: JRuby is a pure Java implementation of a Ruby interpreter.

target.name: compile
target.description: Compile the source files for the project.

target.name: jar-complete
target.description: Create the 'complete' JRuby jar. Pass 'mainclass' and 'filename' to adjust.

target.name: jar-console
target.description: Create the jruby graphical console jar

target.name: jar
target.description: Create the jruby.jar file

target.name: jar-dist
target.description: Create the jruby.jar file for distribution. This version uses JarJar Links to rewrite some packages.

target.name: compile-test
target.description: Compile the unit tests

target.name: copy-test-files
target.description: Make tests fails available as resources

target.name: emma
target.description: turns on EMMA instrumentation/reporting

target.name: test
target.depends: copy-test-files, instrument, run-junit-compiled, run-junit-compiled-1.9, test-security-manager, coverage-report
target.description: Runs unit tests.

target.name: test-all
target.depends: copy-test-files, instrument, test-security-manager, run-junit-interpreted, run-junit-compiled, run-junit-precompiled, run-junit-interpreted-1.9, run-junit-compiled-1.9, run-junit-precompiled-1.9, run-junit-reflected-precompiled, run-junit-interpreted-threadpool, compile-stdlib, coverage-report
target.description: Runs unit tests in all modes.

target.name: weave-tests
target.description: weave the test classes

target.name: test-1.4
target.depends: copy-test-files, jar-1.4, weave-tests, instrument, run-junit-compiled, run-junit-compiled-1.9, coverage-report
target.description: Runs unit tests with weaved jruby classes.

target.name: test-all-1.4
target.depends: copy-test-files, jar-1.4, weave-tests, instrument, run-junit-interpreted, run-junit-compiled, run-junit-precompiled, run-junit-interpreted-1.9, run-junit-compiled-1.9, run-junit-precompiled-1.9, run-junit-reflected-precompiled, run-junit-precompiled-threadpool, compile-stdlib, coverage-report
target.description: Runs unit tests in all modes with weaved jruby classes.

echo.message: compile=@{compile.mode}, jit.threshold=@{jit.threshold}, jit.max=@{jit.max}, objectspace=@{objectspace.enabled} threadpool=@{thread.pooling} reflection=@{reflection} version=@{jruby.version}

target.name: spec
target.description: Runs known good version of rubyspecs.

target.name: spec-all
target.description: Runs known good version of rubyspecs without exclusions.

target.name: spec-all-interpreted
target.description: Runs known good version of rubyspecs without exclusions.

target.name: spec-latest
target.description: Runs the very latest rubyspecs.

target.name: spec-latest-all
target.description: Runs the very latest rubyspecs without exclusions.

target.name: spec-show-excludes
target.description: Prints out all currently excluded rubyspecs.

fail.message: No rubyspecs found. Download them via 'ant spec'.

target.name: create-apidocs
target.description: Creates the Java API docs

target.name: clean
target.description: Cleans almost everything, leaves downloaded specs

target.name: clean-all
target.description: Cleans everything, including downloaded specs

target.description: Set up JRuby to be run with Nailgun (jruby-ng, jruby-ng-server)
